mapper.select: SELECT areaCount, germplasmCount, diCount, employeeCount, batchCount, pengCount FROM ( SELECT base_area AS 'areaCount' FROM agriculture_baseinfo WHERE del_flag = 0 ) base JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'germplasmCount' FROM agriculture_germplasm WHERE del_flag = 0 ) germplasm JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'diCount' FROM agriculture_land WHERE land_type = 0 AND del_flag = 0 ) di JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'employeeCount' FROM agriculture_employee WHERE del_flag = 0 ) employee JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'batchCount' FROM agriculture_crop_batch WHERE del_flag = 0 ) batch JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS 'pengCount' FROM agriculture_land WHERE land_type = 1 AND del_flag = 0 ) peng;

SELECT b.product_name AS 'productName',a.product_id AS 'productId',a.deviceCount FROM ( SELECT product_id, COUNT( device_id ) AS 'deviceCount' FROM iot_device WHERE del_flag = 0 GROUP BY product_id LIMIT 0,3) a LEFT JOIN iot_product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id
UNION ALL
SELECT '其他' AS 'productName',0 AS 'productId',COUNT(deviceCount) AS 'deviceCount' FROM( SELECT product_id, COUNT( device_id ) AS 'deviceCount' FROM iot_device WHERE del_flag = 0 GROUP BY product_id LIMIT 3,2) a LEFT JOIN iot_product b ON a.product_id = b.product_id
UNION ALL
SELECT '合计' AS 'productName',0 AS 'productId',COUNT(device_id) AS 'deviceCount' FROM iot_device WHERE del_flag = 0

SELECT ( SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN `status`=0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FROM iot_device_job ) AS 'startJobCount', ( SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN `status`=1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FROM iot_device_job ) AS 'stopJobCount', ( SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN `status`=0 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FROM iot_device_job_log ) AS 'sExcuteCount', ( SELECT COUNT(CASE WHEN `status`=1 THEN 1 ELSE NULL END) FROM iot_device_job_log ) AS 'eExcuteCount';

select all_months.sMonth as date, ifnull(count(atr.record_id), 0) as num, all_months.month from ( select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-01') as month,'1月' as sMonth union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-02'),'2月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-03'),'3月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-04'),'4月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-05'),'5月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-06'),'6月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-07'),'7月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-08'),'8月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-09'),'9月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-10'),'10月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-11'),'11月' union all select date_format(curdate(), '%Y-12'),'12月' ) as all_months left join ( select date_format(query_date, '%Y-%m') as month, record_id from agriculture_trace_record where year(query_date) = year(curdate()) ) as atr on all_months.month = atr.month group by all_months.sMonth,all_months.month order by all_months.month

select a.`status`,count(a.task_id) as 'num',b.dict_label as name from agriculture_batch_task a left join sys_dict_data b on a.`status` = b.dict_value where b.dict_type='agriculture_batch_task_status' group by a.status,b.dict_label
SELECT a.crop_area AS 'value',b.crop_name AS 'name' FROM agriculture_crop_batch a LEFT JOIN agriculture_germplasm b on a.germplasm_id = b.germplasm_id
SELECT query_city AS 'queryCity',COUNT(record_id) AS 'num' FROM agriculture_trace_record GROUP BY query_city

SELECT * FROM (SELECT COUNT(record_id) AS 'sm' FROM agriculture_trace_record ) a JOIN (SELECT COUNT(sellpro_id) AS 'cp' FROM agriculture_trace_sellpro WHERE del_flag =0) b JOIN (SELECT COUNT(version_id) AS 'bb' FROM agriculture_trace_version WHERE del_flag =0) c JOIN (SELECT COUNT(shop_id) AS 'xsdp' FROM agriculture_trace_shop WHERE del_flag =0 AND shop_type =1) d JOIN (SELECT COUNT(shop_id) AS 'xxdp' FROM agriculture_trace_shop WHERE del_flag =0 AND shop_type =2) e JOIN (SELECT COUNT(staff_id) AS 'ry' FROM agriculture_trace_staff WHERE del_flag =0) f

select a.num, if(b.sellpro_name is null, '其他', b.sellpro_name) as sellproName from ( select sellpro_id, count(record_id) as num from agriculture_trace_record group by sellpro_id ) a left join agriculture_trace_sellpro b on a.sellpro_id = b.sellpro_id;

select (select count(1) from agriculture_trace_sellpro where del_flag = '0') as traceSellproCount, (select count(1) from agriculture_trace_code) as traceCodeCount, (select count(1) as num from (select b.trace_code,count(1) as tracetime from agriculture_trace_record b left join agriculture_trace_code a on a.trace_code = b.trace_code group by b.trace_code having tracetime>1) c) as allTraceAlertCount, (select count(1) from agriculture_trace_record) as allTraceRecordCount, (select count(1) from agriculture_trace_record where date_format(query_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(current_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) as todayTraceRecordCount, (select count(1) as num from (select b.trace_code,count(1) as tracetime from (select * from agriculture_trace_record where date_format(query_date,'%Y-%m-%d') = date_format(current_date,'%Y-%m-%d')) b left join agriculture_trace_code a on a.trace_code = b.trace_code group by b.trace_code having tracetime>1) c) as todayTraceAlertCount

select count(1) as todayTaskCount from agriculture_batch_task a left join agriculture_crop_batch b on a.batch_id = b.batch_id
and b.batch_head =#{batchHead} and date(a.plan_start) = curdate() and a.del_flag=0 and a.status = 0
